Data: Lee to Taylor, no run appeal! Lee gets the ball to bend back in off the pitch but the angle might have pushed it past the legstump, Koertzen shakes his head
Lee to Taylor, no run lands outside off and the ball bends back in late before reaching the keeper
Lee to Taylor, FOUR runs Lee overpitches outside off in trying to search for swing, Taylor gets his body nicely behind the line and drives effortlessly past cover
Lee to Taylor, no run hits a good length on middle and off, he gets across and works it to the on side
Lee to Taylor, no run bangs it in short and drifts down the leg side, he just manages to duck
Lee to Taylor, no run full outside off and pushed to Hauritz at mid-off who's up close
Hauritz to Redmond, no run lands outside off and he shoulders arms
Hauritz to Redmond, no run no turn at all, he steers it to point
Hauritz to Redmond, no run thrusts his pad out and keeps it away
Hauritz to Redmond, no run thrusts his pad out again and he lets it go to Haddin
Hauritz to Redmond, no run close! He pads it away but the ball lobs off it and brushes the glove, haddin flings himself forward in vain to pull off a very tough chance
Hauritz to Redmond, no run defended to the on side
Lee to Taylor, no run full outside off and driven very straight to mid-off, that came off the meat of the bat
Lee to Taylor, no run opens the face of the bat to a full delivery and angles it to Hussey at gully
Lee to Taylor, no run hangs his bat out and then withdraws the stroke, the ball just straightened a bit after pitching
Lee to Taylor, no run and Lee gets this one swing in fairly sharply, he tries to flick but the ball hits his pads
Lee to Taylor, no run Lee's mixing them up cleverly and Taylor's at sea here, this one moves away off the seam and nearly takes the outside edge
Lee to Taylor, (no ball) in all the enthusiasm he oversteps, Taylor drives on the up and at first glance it appears to carry on the full to Symonds at cover
Lee to Taylor, no run cramps him for room outside the off stump and Taylor nearly inside edges onto his stumps, superb testing over by Lee
Hauritz to Redmond, no run flighted outside off, he defends to Ponting at silly point
Hauritz to Redmond, 2 runs flighted on middle and leg, he turns it to fine leg
Hauritz to Redmond, no run Ponting intercepts a booming drive with his shin and he's in a bit of pain
Hauritz to Redmond, no run tossed up outside off, defended down the track
Hauritz to Redmond, no run flighted on middle and leg, he defends
Hauritz to Redmond, 1 run tossed up on middle and leg, he works it to the on side
Lee to Redmond, FOUR runs lovely shot, Lee fires that outside off but it's pitched up and in the length to drive, Redmond gets on his knee and executes a pleasing square drive past point
Lee to Redmond, no run opens the face of the bat and he steers it to gully

Lee to Redmond, FOUR runs crack! Redmond's woken up after lunch, Lee fires that outside the off stump on a full length and Redmond times it very well past cover and extra cover, Rahul Dravid would have appreciated that
Lee to Redmond, no run driven very firmly down the pitch and strikes the stumps
Lee to Redmond, (no ball) 3 runs Lee's overstepping continues, he drives firmly towards mid-off and a misfield yields bonus runs, the throw at the non-striker's end is wide too
Lee to Taylor, no run driven to the off side
Lee to Taylor, FOUR runs Lee again fires it outside off to get swing but loses his radar, Taylor merely opens the face of the bat and steers it safely past gully
Hauritz to Redmond, FOUR runs too wide and a fraction too short too, he rocks backwards and slices it wide of gully

Hauritz to Redmond, OUT Redmond falls right in to the trap and Hauritz has two after lunch! He flights it on middle and leg, he gets on his knee and attempts the slog sweep which fetched him two sixes before lunch, however this time Symonds is there at deep midwicket and he cups it easily over his head after sprinting a few yards to his left
Hauritz to Taylor, no run flighted outside off, pushed back to the bowler
Hauritz to Taylor, no run defended down the track
Hauritz to Taylor, no run defended on the front foot to the on side
Hauritz to Taylor, no run flighted on middle and leg, pushed back to the bowler
Lee to Fulton, no run punched back to the bowler and Lee threatened to fling it back to the stumps
Lee to Fulton, no run bangs it in short and it sails over the big man
Lee to Fulton, no run lands on a good length outside off and he lets it go to the keeper
Lee to Fulton, no run shapes to cut outside off but mistimes it back to the bowler
Lee to Fulton, no run lands on a good length outside off and he shoulders arms
Lee to Fulton, no run fullish outside the off stump and he gets behind the line and works it to mid-off
Hauritz to Taylor, no run gets across his stumps and defends
Hauritz to Taylor, no run holds the length back outside off, he moves across his stumps and shoulders arms
Hauritz to Taylor, 1 run flighted outside off, he gets forward and drives to cover
Hauritz to Fulton, 2 runs flighted outside off, he opens the face of the bat and glides it past slip
Hauritz to Fulton, no run gets behind the line and defends
Lee to Taylor, no run bangs it on a good length outside off, he gets behind the line and defends
Lee to Taylor, no run full outside off and in the length to drive but he places it straight to mid-off
Lee to Taylor, no run hits a good length outside off, he gets nicely behind the line and defends
Lee to Taylor, no run hits a fullish length outside off, the ball bends back in before reaching the keeper
Lee to Taylor, 2 runs swings it in late and he works it across the line down to midwicket
Lee to Taylor, 1 run swings it on the pads again and he works it firmly to the on side but can't beat Katich who dives at square leg and saves at least a couple of runs
Hauritz to Taylor, FOUR runs flighted on middle and off, Taylor takes a chance, gets on his knee and slog sweeps him down to the vacant spaces at deep square-leg
Hauritz to Taylor, 1 run turns it down to square leg
Hauritz to Fulton, no run driven back to the bowler
Hauritz to Fulton, no run gets him to drive on the up and the ball falls short of mid-on
Hauritz to Fulton, no run driven on the front foot down the pitch
Hauritz to Fulton, no run flighted outside off, he thrusts his pad out and shoulders arms
Johnson to Taylor, FOUR runs full outside off, he gets nicely behind the line, maintains his balance and times it well, he places it in the gap between mid-off and cover
Johnson to Taylor, no run angles it on the pads and he tucks it behind square on the on side
Johnson to Taylor, 1 run covers all three stumps before facing and shuffles across before working it wide of square leg
Johnson to Fulton, no run lands on a good length outside off, he shoulders arms
Johnson to Fulton, no run bangs it in short, Fulton gets to negotiate a quick bouncer and hangs his bat out like a periscope as the ball leaves him
Johnson to Fulton, no run pushed to the off side
Hauritz to Taylor, no run full on middle and leg, pushed to the bowler
Hauritz to Taylor, no run gives it more air outside off, he lunges forward and defends
Hauritz to Taylor, no run flighted outside off and pushed towards the covers
Hauritz to Taylor, 1 run flighted on middle and leg, he gets forward and pushes it to the on side for a single
Hauritz to Fulton, 1 run fires it in outside off and he digs it out to point
Hauritz to Taylor, no run circumspection! Taylor gets a long way across his stumps then suddenly changes his mind and shoulders arms, that will keep Hauritz and Haddin interested
Johnson to Fulton, no run works up the pace and bounce and once again catches Fulton in a moment of uncertainty
Johnson to Fulton, no run switches to the conventional good length, he gets behind the line and taps it down to cover
Johnson to Fulton, no run fires it back of a length and Fulton opens the face of the bat and steers it to Hussey at gully

Johnson to Fulton, SIX runs Bring it on says Fulton and man does he club that away! Johnson bangs it in short but the batsman is better prepared now as he rocks back and pulls it with intent over deep square-leg
Johnson to Fulton, no run fullish outside off, he gets forward and pushes it to the off side
Johnson to Fulton, no run pushes this one to mid-off and it's drinks
Hauritz to Taylor, 1 run flighted down the legside, he turns it to fine leg
Hauritz to Fulton, no run Dropped: Drives away from his body, Hayden juggles at slip and puts it down in the second or third attempt
Hauritz to Fulton, no run defended to the bowler
Hauritz to Fulton, no run driven on the front foot
Hauritz to Fulton, no run
Hauritz to Fulton, 1 run drives to the off side and Clarke runs across from point to cut it off
Johnson to Fulton, no run hits a good length on the off stump and he taps it back to the bowler
Johnson to Fulton, no run bowls it full and wide outside off, the attempted yorker, he doesn't offer a shot
Johnson to Fulton, no run pushed down the pitch to the off side
Johnson to Fulton, 1 run angles it towards the pads and he turns it wide of midwicket
Johnson to Taylor, no run full on the offstump and Taylor is very solid on the forward defense
Johnson to Taylor, no run lands on a full length outside off, he shoulders arms
Hauritz to Fulton, no run flighted on off and middle and he defends
Hauritz to Fulton, no run pushes that flatter and quicker outside off and Fulton offers no shot
Hauritz to Fulton, 1 run goes for an across the line hoick over the on side but mistimes it to square leg, Haddin gets excited
Hauritz to Taylor, 1 run gets on his knee early and paddles it away towards fine leg for a single
Hauritz to Fulton, no run gets forward and defends to the off side
Hauritz to Fulton, no run pushed in quicker and fuller, no turn, he defends to the off side
Johnson to Taylor, no run hits a good length outside off, he pushes it back to the bowler
Johnson to Taylor, no run just a fraction wider outside off and he gets across and works it to the off side
Johnson to Taylor, no run fullish on the off stump and defended back down the pitch
Johnson to Taylor, 1 run pushes it through the line towards mid-off and sets off for a quick single
Johnson to Fulton, 2 runs slower ball, he pushes it down the pitch and Johnson makes a half-hearted attempts to intercept it with his left hand, the misfield allows two runs
Johnson to Fulton, no run steered to the off side
Hauritz to Taylor, 1 run gets forward and drives to sweeper cover
Hauritz to Fulton, no run gets forward and pushes it down the pitch
Hauritz to Fulton, no run
Hauritz to Fulton, no run thrusts his pad out and shoulders arms
Hauritz to Fulton, no run even wider outside the off stump and once again Fulton sticks his pad out and lets it go
Hauritz to Fulton, no run flighted outside off and pushed away down the track
Johnson to Taylor, no run starts off with a bouncer, Taylor reads it early and ducks under it early
Johnson to Taylor, no run lands on a good length outside off and angles it away from him, he shoulders arms
Johnson to Taylor, no run Taylor takes his chance with an off drive but drives a little too far away from his body, the away movement just beats him
Johnson to Taylor, no run full outside off and the outside edge just falls short of third slip
Johnson to Taylor, no run ducks under a bouncer
Johnson to Taylor, 1 run fullish outside off and steered just wide of gully
Hauritz to Taylor, 1 run flighted on middle and leg, he turns it behind square on the on side
Hauritz to Fulton, no run gets a half stride forward and defends a full delivery back to the bowler
Hauritz to Fulton, 1 run tucks it away in the region of square leg for an easy single
Hauritz to Taylor, no run fires it across the right hander, he shuffles a long way across his stumps and defends
Hauritz to Taylor, no run gets across his stumps again and defends
Hauritz to Taylor, no run flighted on middle and leg, he gets across and works it with the turn to the on side
Johnson to Fulton, no run lands on a good length outside off, he defends down the track

Johnson to Fulton, 1 leg bye error in judgement, Fulton doesn't know how to deal with the short one, he shapes to play at it and then decides a little too late to withdraw the shot as the ball hits his forearm
Johnson to Taylor, no run angles across him, he defends
Johnson to Taylor, no run gets forward and defends straight to the covers
Johnson to Taylor, no run gets on the front foot and defends solidly to the off side
Johnson to Taylor, FOUR runs nice, Johnson gets it to angle across the right-hander, Taylor covers the movement, opens the face of the bat and glides it past the slip cordon
Hauritz to Fulton, no run
Hauritz to Fulton, no run driven back to the bowler
Hauritz to Fulton, FOUR runs great stuff, Hauritz flights it outside off and Fulton merely stays at the crease and lofts through the line, the ball is well clear of mid-off
Hauritz to Fulton, (no ball) oversteps, Fulton drives to the offside
Hauritz to Fulton, no run flighted outside off, he lets it go to Haddin
Hauritz to Fulton, no run gets forward and defends
Hauritz to Fulton, FOUR runs strange looking shot, he gets on his knee to slog sweep a low full toss but releases his bottom hand at the point of contact, it's enough to fetch a boundary
Johnson to Taylor, 2 runs short of a length on middle and leg, he clips it wide of square leg
Johnson to Taylor, no run gets behind the line and defends back to the bowler
Johnson to Taylor, 1 leg bye shuffles across his stumps and clips it behind square leg for a single
Johnson to Fulton, no run gets behind the line and defends straight back to the bowler
Johnson to Fulton, FOUR runs Risky! He gets forward and drives a little too early, the outside edge just falls short of a diving Hussey at gully and it runs down for four
Johnson to Fulton, no run just manages to cover the line and defend
Symonds to Taylor, no run hits a good length outside off and Taylor lets it go
Symonds to Taylor, no run gets it to swing in and Taylor gets behind the line and defends
Symonds to Taylor, 1 run shuffles across his stumps and works it with the movement to fine leg
Symonds to Fulton, no run gets across his stumps again and taps it down the track
Symonds to Fulton, no run just holds the length back on middle and off, he gets behind the line and defends
Symonds to Fulton, no run lands outside off, he shoulders arms
Johnson to Taylor, no run best ball of this session surely, he pitches it up outside off and gets it to kick up alarmingly and move away, I don't know how that failed to take the edge
Johnson to Taylor, no run comes forward and defends to the covers
Johnson to Taylor, 1 run full and angling away from the middle stump, he pushes it down to the covers
Johnson to Fulton, no run holds the length back a bit outside off, Fulton opens the face of the bat and angles it to Clarke who dives at slip
Johnson to Fulton, no run gets behind the line to a good length ball and defends
Johnson to Fulton, 3 leg byes slides towards the pads and he just manages to nudge it past Haddin who gives the chase
Symonds to Fulton, no run lands outside off, he lets it go
Symonds to Fulton, no run lands just a shade outside off, he lets this one go as well
Symonds to Fulton, no run he lets another one go outside off
Symonds to Fulton, no run gets forward and defends very softly to the off side
Symonds to Fulton, no run shoulders arms again
Symonds to Fulton, 1 run angles it towards the pads and he works it behind square on the on side for a single
Clark to Fulton, 1 run strays on the pads and Fulton whips it uppishly behind square on the on side
Clark to Taylor, no run fails to control the swing and slides it down the leg side, Taylor fails to get wood on it as he attempts to glide it to fine leg
Clark to Taylor, no run fullish outside off and defended back to the bowler
Clark to Taylor, no run bowls it full and gets it to swing in very late, Fulton does well to cover the line or there would have been a loud appeal for an lbw
Clark to Taylor, no run fullish outside off, he steers it to the offside
Clark to Taylor, no run fullish outside off, he steers it to the off side again

Symonds to Fulton, OUT great reflexes from Katich! Symonds bowls it back of a length, Fulton reads the length early and shapes to pull but fails to clear short midwicket, Katich flings himself to his right and catches it with both hands, the Australians are really delighted for Symonds
Symonds to Flynn, no run lands outside off and he shoulders arms
Symonds to Flynn, no run gets plenty of away movement, he offers no shot
Symonds to Flynn, no run and again, thrusts his pad out and watchfully lets it go
Symonds to Flynn, no run and once more, he shoulders arms but this time the ball is closer to the line of the off stump
Symonds to Flynn, no run pitches outside off and he lets it go, tea is not too far away
Clark to Taylor, 2 runs strays on the pads and he gets an inside edge which rolls towards fine leg
Clark to Taylor, no run strays towards the body again and he works it to the on side
Clark to Taylor, no run once again he gets it to move late towards the pads, the ball may have flicked his pads before reaching Haddin
Clark to Taylor, no run defended on the front foot to the on side
Clark to Taylor, no run gets it to angle inwards late from outside the offstump, he gets well forward and defends
Clark to Taylor, no run safely lets it go Haddin and it's tea
Symonds to Flynn, no run lands it outside off and gets it to seam away late, left alone
Symonds to Flynn, no run Flynn continues to be watchful around his off stump
Symonds to Flynn, no run makes him play for a change and he impresses with a neat off drive but it's not enough to beat mid-off
Symonds to Flynn, no run switches to a good length on off and middle and he shuffles across and defends
Symonds to Flynn, no run holds the length back and forces him to go on the back foot and defend
Symonds to Flynn, no run pitches it wide outside off and he defends
Clark to Taylor, FOUR runs gets a bit of late reverse swing and he drives through the line off the meat of the bat, beats mid-off comfortably

Clark to Taylor, OUT Taylor gets the slow death from Koertzen, Clark gets the ball to bend back in off the pitch, Taylor tries to flick across the line but the ball hits him just above the knee roll and in line with middle and leg stump at least, Koertzen thinks about it before giving him out, Hawkeye indicates that it hit him too high
Clark to McCullum, no run gets forward and defends safely
Clark to McCullum, no run fuller in length, gets forward and defends to cover
Clark to McCullum, no run bangs in the bouncer and he safely sways away from it

Clark to McCullum, 2 runs McCullum pulls a short ball past square leg and Hauritz runs across from fine leg to mop up, he twists his ankle on the dive and he's in pain, the players and physio come out for assistance and he's walking off the field, he was wincing in pain for quite a while, not a very pleasant sight
Symonds to Flynn, no run comes round the wicket, he turns it to midwicket
Symonds to Flynn, no run pitches outside off again and he shoulders arms
Symonds to Flynn, no run lands outside off and Flynn lets it go again
Symonds to Flynn, no run short and wide, he shapes to cut but changes hi mind and lets it go
Symonds to Flynn, no run pulls a good length ball but fails to place it wide of the on side field in the circle
Symonds to Flynn, 1 run gets a bit of width and angles it down towards point
Clark to Flynn, no run shuffles across his stumps and works it to midwicket
Clark to Flynn, no run probes outside the offstump and Flynn wisely lets it go
Clark to Flynn, no run lands on a good length around the offstump and he gets behind the line and defends
Clark to Flynn, no run lands outside off and gets it to angle inwards, he opens the face of the bat and angles it towards point
Clark to Flynn, no run angles inwards and he works it towards midwicket

Clark to Flynn, 1 run chance for a catch but did it carry? Flynn gets the width outside off and he drives on the front foot but scoops it towards Hussey at gully, the ball travels quickly and the ball in fact carries to him but slips out of his fingers, tough one for Hussey, to be fair on him
Symonds to Flynn, no run short of a length outside off and he lets it go
Symonds to Flynn, no run gets it to come back in off the seam but he doesn't offer a shot
Symonds to Flynn, FOUR runs a little too wide outside off but the length is just right for Flynn to free his arms and cut along the turf past backward point and cover
Symonds to Flynn, no run defended on the backfoot to the on side
Symonds to Flynn, no run angles inwards and he doesn't offer a shot
Symonds to Flynn, no run slides down the leg side and Flynn fails to glance it fine, Haddin does well to slide to his right and catch it and he half-heartedly appeals for an edge
Clark to McCullum, no run hits a good length on off stump and he places it back to the bowler

Clark to McCullum, SIX runs what a shot! Imperious stuff, Clark gives him width outside off and lands it on a good length, he flays at it and gets enough wood to to send it over the deep cover fence, the square boundaries are short here
Clark to McCullum, 1 run steers it with angled bat to the off side
Clark to Flynn, no run lands outside off and gets it tn angle in and he shoulders arms
Clark to Flynn, no run gets it to come back in and he shoulders arms
Clark to Flynn, no run gets behind the line and defends
Symonds to McCullum, no run full on the off stump, he stands tall and defends
Symonds to McCullum, no run gets forward and defends to the offside
Symonds to McCullum, no run lands on middle and leg and he works it to midwicket
Symonds to McCullum, (no ball) Here we go, another overstep, we've seen a few today, he defends it back to the bowler
Symonds to McCullum, no run lands on off and middle, he tucks it to the on side
Symonds to McCullum, no run pushed to the off side
Symonds to McCullum, 1 run angles a full delivery to the deep on the on side
Clark to McCullum, no run lands on a good length outside off, he gets on the backfoot and defends to the on side
Clark to McCullum, no run offers the full face of the bat and pats it back firmly down the pitch
Clark to McCullum, 1 run slides on the pads, he gets his wrists working and tucks it behind square on the on side

Clark to Flynn, FOUR runs well played by Flynn, the ball angles in from wide outside off and lands on a fullish length, Flynn waits for it and deliberately angles it wide of gully, Hussey chases it but the ball ball beats him
Clark to Flynn, no run adjust the line closer to the offstump, he gets behind the line and defends
Clark to Flynn, no run solidly defended on the front foot, Flynn seems very sure of himself at the crease
Symonds to McCullum, 1 run angles it towards the pads and he nudges it to fine leg
Symonds to Flynn, no run continues round the wicket to the left-hander, he gets back and defends
Symonds to Flynn, 1 run angles it on the pads and pitches it on a full length, he tucks it across the line to the deep on the on side
Symonds to McCullum, 4 byes slides way down the leg side and haddin cannot get a glove on it, it beats everyone and runs to fine leg
Symonds to McCullum, no run down the leg side again but McCullum fails to make contact
Symonds to McCullum, no run hits a good length on middle and leg, he defends back to the bowler
Lee to Flynn, no run lands a shade outside the offstump, he shoulders arms
Lee to Flynn, no run lands outside off and he lets another one go, there's a bit of sideways movement before reaching Haddin
Lee to Flynn, no run lets another one go outside the off stump and there's more carry to Haddin who takes it above his waist
Lee to Flynn, no run slower ball and still wide outside off, Flynn is content letting it go

Lee to Flynn, OUT that's a ripper! Lee fires that from round the wicket, lands it on a good length and gets it to swing in sharply through the air, Flynn fails to get right behind the line and the ball clips his pad and cannons on to the top of the off stump, the bowling change has worked
Lee to Vettori, no run lands outside off and he lets it go
Symonds to McCullum, no run lands outside off and the ball just lands short of short extra cover (Ponting)
Symonds to McCullum, no run full and swinging away and he drives on the front foot to the offside
Symonds to McCullum, no run gets forward and behind the line and pushes it to mid-off
Symonds to McCullum, 1 run gives him width outside off and he cuts to Lee at sweeper cover
Symonds to Vettori, no run lands outside the off stump and he safely lets it go
Symonds to Vettori, no run and another one, Vettori watches it through to the keeper
Lee to Vettori, no run bangs it in short from round the wicket, it was the slower bouncer and Vettori evades it
Lee to Vettori, no run comes from round the wicket and fires it full, he turns it to mid-off
Lee to Vettori, no run in the length to drive through the offside and Vettori pushes it softly to mid-off
Lee to Vettori, no run comes back in off a good length and he hangs his bat out and pushes it back to the bowler
Lee to Vettori, no run tries to force a slower delivery firmly back past the bowler but Lee intercepts it
Lee to Vettori, no run bouncer to end the over and for the zillionth time in his innings Vettori ducks and evades it
Johnson to Southee, no run wakes him up with a bouncer and the ball just about fizzes past his arm guard
Johnson to Southee, no run slides down the legside and there's a sound as the ball beats him, Haddin appeals but replays show the bat clipping the pad on the way

Johnson to Southee, OUT very nasty delivery and Southee is all at sea, Johnson bangs it in short and gets it to rear up on the right hander, Southee is forced to play at it but fails to fend it off with soft hands, the ball lobs off his glove and Katich takes it easily running forward from leg gully
Johnson to O'Brien, no run greets him with a bouncer and and just manages to evade it
Johnson to O'Brien, no run gets behind the line and defends well back to the bowler
Johnson to O'Brien, no run gets forward to a full delivery and defends it easily
Lee to McCullum, no run hits a good length on off stump and he taps it back down the pitch
Lee to McCullum, no run gets forward to a fuller delivery and pushes it down to mid-off
Lee to McCullum, 2 runs fullish outside off and he drives to the deep on the off side
Lee to McCullum, no run 143.2 kph, he exerts himself more and fires it outside off, McCullum safely lets it go
Lee to McCullum, 1 leg bye bowls the inswinger and slides down the legside, the ball brushes his pads and Haddin slides to intercept it
Lee to Vettori, no run bowls the sharp inswinger from round the wicket and Vettori safely negotiates it
Symonds to McCullum, 1 run slides on the pads and he trickles it behind square on the on side for a single
Symonds to Vettori, no run lands a touch wide outside off but he lets it go
Symonds to Vettori, no run pitches outside off and holds its line before reaching the keeper
Symonds to Vettori, no run Vettori tries to get aggressive but luckily he controls the pull and keeps it along the turf to mid-on
Symonds to Vettori, no run wide outside off and he lets it go
Symonds to Vettori, no run pushed down the track back to the bowler
Lee to Vettori, 1 run gets forward to a full delivery and places it wide of mid-off and bravely lets O'Brien have the strike
Lee to O'Brien, no run falls over backwards as he tries to evade a nasty fizzer. Lee gives him a stare
Lee to O'Brien, no run does very well to dig out a full inswinging yorker, expect more of those from Lee

Lee to O'Brien, OUT that's 50 wickets in the calendar year for Lee, he pitches it just back of a length outside off and O'Brien gets forward to defend, the thick outside edge is taken very well by Haddin who flings himself to his right, cups it with both hands and falls hard on his elbows
Lee to Martin, no run Martin does very well to dig out a yorker swinging in on the stumps
Lee to Martin, no run lands outside off and Martin does well to let that go
Johnson to Vettori, no run bangs it in back of a length outside off and he lets it go to Haddin
Johnson to Vettori, no run tucks away a full delivery on the pads to the deep on the on side but he refuses the single
Johnson to Vettori, no run very quick bouncer and he safely lets it go
Johnson to Vettori, no run comes round the wicket and fires a bouncer from wide of the crease, Vettori walks a long way across his stumps and opts out of the shot
Johnson to Vettori, no run moves a long way away from his stumps and the ball is too wide outside off for him to chase it
Johnson to Vettori, no run bangs in the bouncer and Vettori has no option but to leave it, that exposes Martin to Lee
Lee to Martin, no run drives impressively to the left of Symonds at mid-off and calls for the run but Vettori wisely turns it down
Lee to Martin, no run this one fizzes past his chest and he moves backwards and evades it

Lee to Martin, OUT the middle stump is flattened and Vettori is stranded, Lee fires it full and gets it to swing in sharply, Martin fails to get bat on ball and the ball deflects off his pad and crashes on to the stump, it's also the 24th Test duck for Martin
The Australian seamers really stifled the batsmen and Johnson deserves a lot of credit for peppering them with bouncers.

Lee finishes with 4 for 66 and NZ ed on a disappointing 270, after opting to bat. Their batsmen needed to find form after Brisbane but with the exception of Redmond, the rest failed to capitalise. It's time for Scott Styris to change his mind and come out of Test retirement.
Vettori to Haddin, 1 run slides down the legside and he clips it wide of square leg to bring up his first Test fifty and an entertaining one too
Vettori to Clarke, no run pitches outside leg, he defends
Vettori to Clarke, no run thrusts his pad forward and defends again
Vettori to Clarke, no run slides down the legside, thrusts his pad forward and leaves it alone
Vettori to Clarke, no run thrusts his pad forward and pads it away
Vettori to Clarke, no run action replay, he's content padding those off
O'Brien to Haddin, FOUR runs bowls the slower ball and it's a low full toss on middle and leg, he merely pushes it through the line and beats mid-on
O'Brien to Haddin, no run good length outside off and pushed to the off side
O'Brien to Haddin, 3 runs just gives him a bit of width outside off and he deliberately angles it wide of the slips, Taylor gives the chase and he relays it to Flynn
O'Brien to Clarke, no run driven on the front foot to the covers
O'Brien to Clarke, no run shoulders arms outside off
O'Brien to Clarke, 2 runs full on middle and leg, he pushes it towards long-on and Vettori runs across from mid-off to cut it off
Vettori to Haddin, no run flighted outside leg, he leaves it alone
Vettori to Haddin, no run padded away to short fine-leg
Vettori to Haddin, no run lands on the rough outside leg and he leaves it alone
Vettori to Haddin, no run gets to the pitch of the ball and he pushes it to mid-on
Vettori to Haddin, (no ball) a big overstep, he pads it off
Vettori to Haddin, FOUR runs lovely shot, Vettori flights it outside the legstump, he decides to have a go at it and dances down the track and scoops it over midwicket
Vettori to Haddin, no run tries to sweep but misses

Redmond to Haddin, 2 runs strays on the pads and he works it away down to fine leg
Redmond to Haddin, no run comes down the track and clubs a low full to down the pitch
Redmond to Haddin, no run just a hint of turn as it lands outside the legstump, he defends
Redmond to Haddin, 2 runs comes down the track to a full ball and drives to sweeper cover

Redmond to Haddin, (no ball) it's a no ball and he strays really wide down the legside, he thrusts his pad out and it deflects to fine leg, Doctrove signals a dead ball but had the batsman left it alone they would have picked up four bonus runs
Redmond to Haddin, FOUR runs comes down the track and smacks it high over mid-on, that's confidence for you
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run comes over the wicket and pushes it to the covers for a single
Vettori to Haddin, no run defended back to the bowler

Redmond to Clarke, no run lands outside leg and he pads it away
Redmond to Clarke, no run floated outside leg and he gets a long way across and pads it off

Vettori to Haddin, no run lands outside leg and he leaves it alone
Vettori to Haddin, no run lets it go outside leg and he shoulders arms

Martin to Clarke, no run hits a good length outside off and comes back in, he pushes it to the off side

Vettori to Haddin, no run pads it away
Vettori to Haddin, no run defended to the on side
Vettori to Haddin, no run gets forward and gets an inside edge on to his pads
Martin to Clarke, no run lands outside off and the ball holds its line before reaching the keeper

Vettori to Haddin, no run steps down the pitch and lobs it off his pads to the off side

Martin to Clarke, 1 run lands outside off and he improvises by turning the face of the bat and working ti wide of midwicket

Ryder to Clarke, 1 run he lives on the edge but he makes it and gets to three-figures, he gets his pad forward and nudges a big inswinger to the on side, there's hesitation in the running but the throw to the bowler
Ryder to Haddin, FOUR runs shot, too wide outside the off stump, he reaches out and plays a front foot square cut past backward point

Ryder to Haddin, no run good save, Haddin plays a booming cover drive and Flynn saves a four at short cover

Southee to Haddin, FOUR runs that's his 100! He slides it on the pads and Haddin whips it past midwicket, he's absolutely delighted and raises his bat and helmet to a standing ovation, Adam Gilchrist cheers from the stands, what a well-deserved 100 despite the dropped catch after lunch

O'Brien to Lee, 4 leg byes that's a tester for the batsman, he bangs it in short and angles it towards the body, he tries to evade it but the ball clips the arm guard and beats the diving McCullum

O'Brien to Lee, no run struggles with his radar and slides that down the legside

Vettori to Lee, SIX runs that's the first of the innings, Vettori flights it on middle and leg, he gets down the track and launches him downtown over long-on, he must have said to himself 'Man, that's six' and he was right
O'Brien to Haddin, no run punches it towards mid-off
O'Brien to Haddin, FOUR runs bangs it in short and he picks the length early and clubs him across the line past midwicket, maintains his balance well

Vettori to Lee, no run flighted on middle and leg, he turns it to the on side
Vettori to Lee, no run slower through the air, he gets forward and pushes it through the line to cover

O'Brien to Haddin, 1 run bangs in the slow bouncer, he pulls but mistimes it to square leg, Fulton sprints and fires the throw to the batsman's end, Lee sets off for a second run but quickly turns around
O'Brien to Lee, no run the bouncer forces Lee to duck under it
O'Brien to Lee, FOUR runs short and wide and asking to be slapped, Lee stays at the crease, gets his bat high on the body and upper cuts it over the two gully fielders

O'Brien to Lee, no run fuller in length, he gets some bat on it and works it to the off side
O'Brien to Lee, no run another nasty lifter, Lee loses sight of the ball as he tries to evade it and gets hit on the back
Vettori to Haddin, no run comes over the wicket, lands outside leg and he doesn't offer a shot
Vettori to Haddin, no run slides down the legside and he lets this one go as well
Vettori to Haddin, 1 run exposes his stumps a bit and pushes a full delivery through the line to mid-off
Vettori to Lee, FOUR runs Vettori gives it a lot of air, he gets down the track and swoops it over the bowler's head, a few inches more and that would have gone over the rope
Vettori to Lee, 1 run flighted down the legside, he sweeps and brings up the 200 run lead
Vettori to Haddin, no run works his wrists and places it to short midwicket

O'Brien to Lee, OUT Taylor pulls off a blinder and he can scarcely believe it, the ball is banged in short outside off and Lee attempts an upper cut, the ball travels quickly over the slips and Taylor at first slip stretches out his right hand and plucks it over his head and falls backwards
O'Brien to Johnson, no run bangs in the short ball from over the wicket, he pulls but the ball makes contact with the body and rolls to the slips
O'Brien to Johnson, no run Another bouncer, this one fizzes past his chest
O'Brien to Johnson, 2 runs pulls a short ball past midwicket and the ball races away towards the boundary, Flynn does brilliantly to dive to his left and cut it off
O'Brien to Johnson, no run angles across the left hander and he leaves oit
O'Brien to Johnson, no run another one angles across him and he lets that fizz past him

Vettori to Johnson, no run drives a full length ball firmly to the off side and How at silly point takes a painful blow on the body

Vettori to Johnson, no run slower through the air, he rocks back and cuts but can't beat point

Martin to Johnson, no run continues over the wicket, bangs it in on the off stump and he gets nicely behind the line and defends
Martin to Johnson, no run full outside off and defends to mid-off

Martin to Haddin, no run wide outside the off stump and he reaches out and mistimes the cut to point

Martin to Johnson, no run delivers from slightly wide of the crease, angles across the left-hander and he steers it towards point

Redmond to Haddin, 1 run driven on the front foot to long-on
Ryder to Haddin, 1 run gets forward and pushes to deep midwicket
Ryder to Johnson, no run gets forward and defends down the pitch
Ryder to Johnson, no run gets forward and defends to the off side
Ryder to Johnson, no run pushed to the on side
Ryder to Johnson, FOUR runs strays on the pads and he whips it away powerfully past midwicket, he places it in the gap perfectly
Ryder to Johnson, FOUR runs Ryder again strays on the pads and it's an action replay, Southee nearly pulls it back before the rope
Redmond to Haddin, SIX runs bowls the half tracker on middle and leg, he swivels and clubs it over deep square leg, the ball just falls over the rope
Redmond to Haddin, FOUR runs continues round the wicket, lands short on middle and he almost flat-bats it past extra cover
Redmond to Haddin, 1 run comes over the wicket, lands outside off and he pushes it to the off side for a single
Redmond to Haddin, SIX runs comes over the wicket, it lands outside leg and he swings across the line and clears deep midwicket, it lands down the throat of a spectator and boy is he delighted
Redmond to Haddin, no run drives down the track and nearly spoons it back to Redmond
Vettori to Hauritz, no run Vettori returns for a new spell, he defends a full ball
Vettori to Hauritz, no run comes forward and defends down the track
Vettori to Hauritz, no run flighted outside off, he defends to the off side
Vettori to Hauritz, no run gets forward and defends down the track
Vettori to Hauritz, no run flighted outside off, he gets forward and drives to mid-off
Vettori to Hauritz, no run the ball stops on him and he nearly chips it back on the full to Vettori
Redmond to Clark, no run gets a half stride forward and defends with soft hands
Redmond to Clark, 1 run gives it a lot of air outside off and he slices it on the up past gully
Redmond to Hauritz, no run chips it very half-heartedly and Redmond nearly pulls off a one-handed stunner diving to his left
Redmond to Hauritz, (no ball) 1 run oversteps, he turns it to the on side
Redmond to Clark, no run full on the pads and pushed to mid-on
Redmond to Clark, no run gets forward to play straight but gets a leading edge towards gully
Vettori to Hauritz, no run lands on middle and he gets behind the line and defends
Vettori to Hauritz, no run gets forward and defends to the off side
Vettori to Hauritz, no run gives it a bit more air, he pushes it towards cover

Australia lead by 265 and are now in a position from which they shouldn't lose. New Zealand have time on their hands so it's imperative they approach their second innings with patience, even if it makes for boring cricket. Haddin's innings, following the pressure on him to perform, should inspire them.
Australia won by an innings and 62 runs
Player of the match is Brad Haddin, AUS
